# AppEntityAnnotatable

**Protocol**

A protocol that framework types adopt to enable you to provide content to system experiences.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol AppEntityAnnotatable
```

## Overview

Do not declare new conformances to `AppEntityAnnotatable`. Framework types like [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity] conform to the protocol to enable you to make your app’s content available to system experiences, including Siri and Apple Intelligence.

## Instance Properties

- **appEntityIdentifier**: The identifier of an app entity you set on framework types to make app content available to system experiences.
